trans-unit.source: Provides the ability to iterate through subpaths in a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> and test the types of shapes contained in each subpath.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a capacidade de iterar através de subpaths num <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> e os tipos de formas contidos em cada Subcaminho de teste.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> classe com especificado <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object for which this helper class is to be initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto para o qual esta classe de programa auxiliar está a ser inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> property and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> property arrays of the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <> </> *> propriedade e <> </> *> propriedade as matrizes de associada <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> para as duas matrizes de especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the `startIndex` and `endIndex` parameters to copy a specified range of the path data.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o `startIndex` e `endIndex` parâmetros para copiar um intervalo especificado dos dados de caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após a devolver, contém uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que representa os pontos do caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após a devolver, contém uma matriz de bytes que representa os tipos de pontos do caminho.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the starting index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o índice de início de matrizes.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the ending index of the arrays.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o índice de fim de matrizes.

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de pontos do caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos do caminho.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Versões de todos os recursos utilizados por este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Calling `Dispose` allows the resources used by this <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator> object to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: Chamar `Dispose` permite que os recursos utilizados por este <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>o objeto a possível reatribuir porque para outros fins.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator>

trans-unit.source: Copies the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathPoints*> property and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.PathTypes*> property arrays of the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> into the two specified arrays.
trans-unit.target: Copia o <> </> *> propriedade e <> </> *> propriedade as matrizes de associada <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> para as duas matrizes de especificado.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"></xref> structures that represents the points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após a devolver, contém uma matriz de <xref href="System.Drawing.PointF"> </xref> estruturas que representa os pontos do caminho.

trans-unit.source: Upon return, contains an array of bytes that represents the types of points in the path.
trans-unit.target: Após a devolver, contém uma matriz de bytes que representa os tipos de pontos do caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of points copied.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos copiado.

trans-unit.source: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Permite que um objeto para tentar libertar recursos e efetuar outras operações de limpeza antes de que reclamada a através da recolha de lixo.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the path associated with this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> contains a curve.
trans-unit.target: Indica se o caminho associada a este <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> contém uma curva.

trans-unit.source: All curves in a path are stored as sequences of Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Todos os curvas num caminho são armazenadas como sequências de Bézier splines.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you add an ellipse to a path, you specify the upper-left corner, the width, and the height of the ellipse's bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando adiciona um elipse para um caminho, pode especificar o canto superior esquerdo, a largura e altura do retângulo delimitador de elipse.

trans-unit.source: Those numbers (upper-left corner, width, and height) are not stored in the path; instead; the ellipse is converted to a sequence of four Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Os números (canto superior esquerdo, largura e altura) não são armazenados no caminho; em vez disso; elipse é convertido para uma sequência de quatro Bézier splines.

trans-unit.source: The path stores the endpoints and control points of those Bézier splines.
trans-unit.target: Os pontos de controlo desses splines Bézier e os pontos finais de arquivos de caminho.

trans-unit.source: A path stores an array of data points, each of which belongs to a line or a Bézier spline.
trans-unit.target: Um caminho armazena uma matriz de pontos de dados, cada um dos quais pertence a uma linha ou um spline Bézier.

trans-unit.source: If some of the points in the array belong to Bézier splines, then HasCurve returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Se alguns dos pontos de na matriz de pertencer ao Bézier splines, em seguida, devolve HasCurve `true`.

trans-unit.source: If all points in the array belong to lines, then HasCurve returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Se todos os pontos de matriz de pertencerem a linhas, em seguida, devolve HasCurve `false`.

trans-unit.source: Certain methods flatten a path, which means that all the curves in the path are converted to sequences of lines.
trans-unit.target: Determinados métodos aplanar um caminho, o que significa que todos os curvas no caminho são convertidas em sequências de linhas.

trans-unit.source: After a path has been flattened, HasCurve will always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Depois de um caminho tem foi simplificado, HasCurve devolverá sempre `false`.

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, or <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> method of the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> class will flatten a path.
trans-unit.target: Chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>, <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A>, ou no <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A>método de <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath>classe será aplanar um caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Warp%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Widen%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.Flatten%2A>

trans-unit.source: This method returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current subpath contains a curve; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> se o Subcaminho atual contém uma curva; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> object has a <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Isto <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> objeto tem um <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto associado.

trans-unit.source: The NextMarker method increments the associated <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> to the next marker in its path and copies all the points contained between the current marker and the next marker (or end of path) to a second <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object passed in to the parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método NextMarker incrementa associada <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> para marcador seguinte no respetivo caminho e as cópias de todos os pontos de contidos entre o marcador atual e o marcador seguinte (ou de fim do caminho) para um segundo <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto transmitido para o parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>método para definir os marcadores de um caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: Marcadores são utilizados para criar grupos de subpaths.

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais subpaths podem estar entre marcadores de dois.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object to which the points will be copied.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> que irão ser copiados os pontos de objeto.

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos entre esta marcador e a próxima.

trans-unit.source: Increments the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> to the next marker in the path and returns the start and stop indexes by way of the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: Incrementos o <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> para marcador seguinte no caminho e devolve os índices de início e paragem título os parâmetros [fora].

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A> method to set markers in a path.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>método para definir os marcadores de um caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath.SetMarkers%2A>

trans-unit.source: Markers are used to create groups of subpaths.
trans-unit.target: Marcadores são utilizados para criar grupos de subpaths.

trans-unit.source: One or more subpaths can be between two markers.
trans-unit.target: Um ou mais subpaths podem estar entre marcadores de dois.

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that starts a subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] A referência de número inteiro fornecida para este parâmetro recebe o índice do ponto de que inicia um Subcaminho de.

trans-unit.source: [out] The integer reference supplied to this parameter receives the index of the point that ends the subpath to which `startIndex` points.
trans-unit.target: [out] A referência de número inteiro fornecida para este parâmetro recebe o índice do ponto que termina o Subcaminho ao qual `startIndex` pontos.

trans-unit.source: The number of points between this marker and the next.
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos entre esta marcador e a próxima.

trans-unit.source: Gets the starting index and the ending index of the next group of data points that all have the same type.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a partir do índice e o índice final do grupo seguinte dados pontos que têm o mesmo tipo.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the point type shared by all points in the group.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o tipo de ponto partilhado por todos os pontos no grupo.

trans-unit.source: Possible types can be retrieved from the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Tipos possíveis podem ser obtidos a partir de <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.PathPointType"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice do grupo de pontos de partida.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the group of points.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice do grupo de pontos de fim.

trans-unit.source: This method returns the number of data points in the group.
trans-unit.target: Este método devolve o número de pontos de dados no grupo.

trans-unit.source: If there are no more groups in the path, this method returns 0.
trans-unit.target: Se não existirem mais nenhum grupos no caminho, este método devolve 0.

trans-unit.source: Gets the next figure (subpath) from the associated path of this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a figura seguinte (Subcaminho) do caminho de associados deste <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> that is to have its data points set to match the data points of the retrieved figure (subpath) for this iterator.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> que consiste em ter os respetivos pontos definido para corresponder aos pontos de dados a figura obtida (Subcaminho) para este iterator.

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the current subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] Indica se o Subcaminho atual está fechado.

trans-unit.source: It is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the if the figure is closed, otherwise it is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: É <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref> esteja a caso a figura fechada, caso contrário, é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The number of data points in the retrieved figure (subpath).
trans-unit.target: O número de pontos de dados na figura obtida (Subcaminho).

trans-unit.source: If there are no more figures to retrieve, zero is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhuma figuras mais obter, zero é devolvida.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> to the next subpath in the path.
trans-unit.target: Move o <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> para o Subcaminho seguinte no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The start index and end index of the next subpath are contained in the [out] parameters.
trans-unit.target: O índice de início e o índice de fim do Subcaminho seguinte estão contidos nos parâmetros [fora].

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the starting index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice de início do Subcaminho seguinte.

trans-unit.source: [out] Receives the ending index of the next subpath.
trans-unit.target: [out] Recebe o índice de fim do Subcaminho seguinte.

trans-unit.source: [out] Indicates whether the subpath is closed.
trans-unit.target: [out] Indica se o Subcaminho está fechado.

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O número de subpaths no <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPath"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Rewinds this <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"></xref> to the beginning of its associated path.
trans-unit.target: Isto rewinds <xref href="System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator"> </xref> no início do respetivo caminho associado.

trans-unit.source: The first time you call the <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> method of an iterator, it gets the first figure (subpath) of that iterator's associated path.
trans-unit.target: A primeira tem de chamar o <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>método de um iterator, obtém a primeira figura (Subcaminho) do caminho associado que iterator</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The second time, it gets the second figure, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Na segunda vez, obtém a figura segundo e assim sucessivamente.

trans-unit.source: When you call the Rewind method, the sequence starts over; that is, after you call Rewind, the next call to <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A> gets the first figure in the path.
trans-unit.target: Quando chamar o método Rewind, a sequência é iniciado através de; ou seja, depois de chamar Rewind, a próxima chamada para <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>obtém a primeira ilustração no caminho.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextSubpath%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A> and <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> methods behave similarly.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>e <xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A>métodos comportar-se de forma semelhante.</xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextPathType%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Drawing2D.GraphicsPathIterator.NextMarker%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de subpaths no caminho.

trans-unit.source: The number of subpaths in the path.
trans-unit.target: O número de subpaths no caminho.
